function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to mosquitoes due to housing quality and urban planning","Impact":"Increased risk of arboviral infection and mosquito-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Improving housing quality, implementing mosquito control methods, and creating mosquito-proof environments","Technologies":"Insecticide treated screens, air-conditioning, mosquito control methods","People":"Urban residents, particularly those in areas with high mosquito density","Owner":"Urban planners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of multi-sectoral collaboration in designing healthier cities","Impact":"Ineffective vector control and increased burden of mosquito-borne disease","Mitigation":"Encouraging and pursuing multi-sectoral collaborations, implementing integrated vector control methods","Technologies":"Integrated vector control methods, urban planning strategies","People":"Urban planners, public health authorities, environmental agencies","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited access to permanent running water and urban heat stress","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne disease and urban heat-related health issues","Mitigation":"Improving access to permanent running water, reducing urban heat stress through urban geometry improvements","Technologies":"Urban geometry improvements, water infrastructure development","People":"Urban residents, particularly those in areas with limited access to water","Owner":"Urban planners, government authorities"}]}
